newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austrian shares close lower, further losses seen.
newsitem.headline: Austrian shares close lower, further losses seen.

text.p: 1225 GMT - Austrian shares fall after last minute sell-off ahead of Friday's expiry date. Traders say index unable to hold Tuesday's 1,090 levels and could head down to 1,060.
* ATX index closes down 14,98 points or 1.38 percent at 1,073.54
* October ATX future up 3.8 schillings at 1,085.6
* Eight ATX shares up, 11 down, two unchanged
* Leading gainer Creditanstalt up 120 schillings at 1,550
* Leading decliner VA Stahl, down 20 schillings at 350
* Vienna Bourse index down 4.26 points or 1.03 percent at 411.33
